community-role-edit.title: Stel functie van het lid in
community-role-edit.explanations:
Functie toestemmingen

Eigenaar - wijst beheerders aan

Beheerder - bewerkt instellingen, wijst mods aan

Moderator - dempen, vastzetten, stelt titels gebruikers in

Lid - vermeld in leiderschap overzicht

Gast - standaard; kan publiceren en reageren

Gedempt - nieuwe publicaties automatisch verborgen

wallet.hive-description: HIVE is een verhandelbare token die ieder moment overgedragen kan worden. HIVE kan worden omgezet tot HIVE Power via een Power Up.
wallet.hive-power-description: HIVE Power is een invloed token. Door deze vast te houden neemt het in hoeveelheid toe en geeft het meer stem invloed. Hoe meer HIVE Power iemand heeft, hoe meer invloed deze heeft op de beloningen van anderen en hoe hoger jouw verdiensten zijn bij het waarderen van anderen hun publicaties. Hive Power is staked HIVE token die opgeheven kan worden na 13 weken.

points.main-description: Punten kunnen gebruikt worden voor in-app diensten, zoals promotie, Boost, Gifting. Verdien ze gewoon door gebruik te maken van Ecency apps en verbeter jouw ervaring.
points.post-desc: Je kunt punten verdienen door regelmatig te posten. Het posten geeft je 15 punten.
points.comment-desc: Ieder antwoord die je geeft helpt je om je publiek te laten groeien en vriendschappen te maken, maar je verdient ook 5 punten.
points.checkin-desc: Inchecken op de Ecency geeft je 0.25 punten en helpt je om in contact te blijven met je vrienden.
points.vote-desc: Door te stemmen geef je beloningen aan andere makers en toon je waardering, maar verdien je ook punten met een gewicht van 0,01 x stem recht.
points.reblog-desc: Deel berichten met je vrienden en verdien 1 punten.
points.login-desc: Wanneer u inlogt bij Ecency heeft u recht om automatisch 10 punten te verdienen.
points.checkin-extra-desc: Structureel gebruik van de app geeft u extra kansen om meer 10 punten te verdienen, door actiever te zijn is er meer te verdienen.
points.delegation-desc: Je kunt ~100 punten per dag verdienen voor elke 1000HP toevertrouwd.
points.community-desc: Registreer je community om 20 punten te krijgen per post gepubliceerd met Ecency applicaties.

witnesses.page-description-long: Role of witnesses or block producers in Hive blockchain is to act as the network's governance body. Community elects them to represent their voice and each user can elect up to 30 witnesses. Top 20 witnesses are producing blocks every minute while rest remain as backup witness and gets randomized chance every minute. This role is integral part of consensus mechanism blockchain runs on and recommend user engagement to vote on trusted witnesses.
witnesses.extra-description: Enter account name below to vote for a witness outside of Top 50
witnesses.proxy-description: You can also choose a proxy that will vote for witnesses for you. This will reset your current witness selection.
witnesses.proxy-active-description: You have set a voting proxy. If you would like to re-enable manual voting, please clear your proxy.

proposals.page-description: The Decentralized Hive Fund (DHF) is an on-chain funding mechanism that allows anyone to submit a proposal and get funding once community votes pass certain threshold. To learn more read our FAQ.
proposals.return-description: This is the base return proposal. Every proposal with less votes will not receive funds.

about.intro-content: Ecency is beautiful and handy wrapper interface around the Hive blockchain network allowing you to create your own posts, surf your feeds, vote what you like, write comments, read replies, do all major Hive functions in your daily social surfing as well as wallet actions and other extras such as search, discover different tags etc.

faq.search-not-found: Nothing was found. To ask our community, join our
faq.what-is-ecency-body:
Ecency is a blockchain based decentralized social network - powered by Hive.

Ecency is home of free speech and rewarding communities for content creators with true/full ownership.

Project is founded by Feruz Muradov in August 2016 as an alternative social network that's uncensored, user controled, immutable and opensource. There are many independent and voluntary contributors who work together to bring the vision to masses.

Ecency is hub of communities powered by cutting edge technology where users are getting paid for their time, resources and learn while having complete control over their account, communities and content. Through ease of use, users not only learn but also become investors, innovators of the new internet.
faq.what-is-hive-body: Hive is a blockchain that was designed to be fast, feeless, decentralized, uncensored platform for Web3.0 applications, with built-in features where stake holders can earn rewards by staking, curating, posting, playing games, trading - all without any middle man (decentralized). Tokens on Hive blockchain called HIVE, HIVE DOLLARS, HIVE POWER.
faq.what-is-difference-header: What's the difference from other Social Networks?
faq.what-is-difference-body: The primary difference, Ecency is based on a blockchain which means content is immutable and uncensorable. You own your community and account, nobody but you have full control of your data. Empowering true free speech. Ecency is also opensource, rewarding and innovative, built and owned by users. Aspire for greatness!
faq.why-choose-ecency-body: Tailored feature set to empower you to create, inspire your audience and community. Ecency mobile application giving you on-go solution. With desktop app you are always sure to get uncensored content right from the blockchain, with website reach thousands of readers accross globe with best ranked content on search engines. State of art security measures so your keys will always stay encrypted and out of reach for ill-intentioned individuals. Fast and beautiful website, helps you to get discovered online and gain exposure for your content and gain loyal followers and readers. Build your community with Ecency today and take advantages of emerging blockchain technology and uncensored content, true free speech!
faq.how-ecency-works-body: Ecency stores and reads data from the blockchain, and thus data is accessible and uncensored. Ecency rewards content creators with built-in incentive mechanism of blockchain, with tokens (HIVE, HIVE DOLLARS, HIVE POWER) as well as Points. Tokens can be purchased and sold in major cryptocurrency exchanges (e.g. Binance, Bittrex). Points could be utilized within platform and traded for goods, services.
faq.how-to-join-body: Go to https://ecency.com/signup?referral=ecency and create an account. After signup you will receive email with further instructions. Your password is your master password to your account. Please store it safely, if you loose your password, you ultimately loose access to your account and your funds. Accounts cannot be deactivated or deleted, account names can not be changed as well. The account along with all of its activity is permanently stored in the blockchain. Without password, accounts cannot be restored, store your keys safely.
faq.how-to-signin-header: How to sign in to Ecency?
faq.how-to-signin-body: You can sign-in to Ecency by using your Username and Master password or by using Active Private Keys. We take security very seriously, that's why we never store your private keys, on mobile app they are encrypted with extra PIN code of your choice, on website they are never stored. You can also use Hivesigner OAuth2 authentication service to easily login, manage and perform actions.
faq.how-referrals-work-header: How referral system work on Ecency?
faq.how-referrals-work-body: Referral system is simple, you can invite your friends by adding your username in this link https://ecency.com/signup?referral=username and share it with your friends. Once your friends join Ecency and earn their first 250 Points, you will earn 100 Points. There is no limits on referrals and its reward.
faq.what-is-points-header: What are Ecency Points and how to use them?
faq.what-is-points-body: Ecency Points are continually minted and rewarded for all users for various social activities they perform on website, mobile or desktop app. Points can be used for promoting, boosting your content, can even be transferred or gifted to another user. You can also purchase Points with our mobile apps.
faq.where-tokens-come-header: Where do the tokens come from?
faq.where-tokens-come-body: The Hive network continually creates new digital tokens to reward content creators and curators. Some of the newly-created tokens are transferred to users who add value to platform by posting, commenting, and voting on other people's posts. The remainder is distributed to holders of HIVE POWER and the witnesses that secures the blockchain.
faq.how-promotion-work-body: Promoting content on Ecency is very simple and easy. Ecency Points are used to promote content for 1, 2, 3, 7 or 14 days to get more exposure. Promoted posts are shuffled across the feeds to all users in mobile app, desktop app and website. There is no limit or restrictions, any post can be promoted to get more exposure and engagement. We hold right to remove posts from promotion list if it violates certain internet etiquette.
faq.how-boosting-work-body:
Points can be used for boosting content (post and comments). Boosting requests are manually reviewed by our moderators and curators which might take upto 24 hours.

As part of the qualities check, we may consider: a) Content is original content, b) Not detected by cheetah, mackbot, hivewatchers, or any other blacklists etc. c) User is not in Ecency blacklist due to abusive behavior.

Boosting does not guarantee curation, if content is not curated within 24 hours Points will be refunded.
faq.how-to-transfer-body: After login, you will find Wallet page in top header on website and desktop app or in Profile page, bottom navigation bar on mobile app. In wallet page you can initiate transfer of any token you hold to another user or exchange accounts, click on arrow next to your balance and find transfer operations. Transfers are irreversible because they are registered on blockchain, make sure to send correct recipient.
faq.how-see-rewards-header: How do I see my post rewards?
faq.how-see-rewards-body:
In Wallet page (in top header on website and desktop app, bottom navigation bar on mobile app), you can see Curation rewards (the rewards earned for upvoting posts and comments) and Author rewards (the rewards earned by your own posts and comments)

You can also view the same information for other users by visiting their wallet profile.
faq.how-dhf-work-body:
Anyone can create a proposal and convince community to vote on their proposal to get funded. Before creating proposal, normal post should be published on blockchain and it is recommended to gather feedback before creating proposal. Proposal creation has fee of 10 HBD + 1 HBD for each day it lasts over 60 days.

Once proposal reaches certain threshold of tallied votes, it will start receiving funds each hour. If proposal falls below threshold, system will halt funding for that proposal. You can vote as many proposals as you want, there are no limits. Proposal cannot be edited, but can be deleted/withdrawn by creator.
faq.when-claim-rewards-header: When can I claim my rewards?
faq.when-claim-rewards-body: Posts and comments remain active for 7 days and rewards are fluctuates depending on votes and market price of token, that is why rewards are approximated as pending reward. When the period is over, pending reward changes to actual reward and you are able to claim earned rewards. In your Wallet, click the Claim Rewards button to add the tokens to your account.
faq.what-are-rc-body:
Transacting on the Hive blockchain has zero fees, transaction rate-limiting is employed to safeguard the blockchain from spam attacks. Every action that you take on the blockchain will consume a small amount of Resource Credits. This includes posting, commenting, voting, transferring tokens, etc. Viewing content does not consume Resource Credits.

Every user has a limited amount of Resource Credits to use each week. The more transactions a user does, the less Resource Credits they will have left (until they recharge). Users with more HIVE POWER will have more Resource Credits.

If you run out of Resource Credits, you will be unable to transact with the blockchain until your Resource Credits recharge (happens automatically) or you acquire additional HIVE POWER to increase your Resource Credit balance or you can request Boosting account from Ecency to receive temporary delegation.
faq.how-boost-account-body: If your account is low on Resource Credits, you can request account boosting from Ecency. You will receive 30 days delegation (553311 VESTS) which should boost your account to perform more activities on blockchain. Delegation could be withdrawn anytime if our team finds inappropriate use of power. You can request account boosting quickly with QR page just change username and scan QR image with Ecency mobile app.
faq.what-spam-abuse-header: What is considered spam or abuse?
faq.what-spam-abuse-body:
• Plagiarized posts or copied content.
  • Leaving nearly identical or materially similar comments on multiple posts.
  • Using tags that are unrelated to the post.
  • Threatening users with any type of physical violence.
  • Not citing sources when using someone elseâ€™s material.
  • Posting â€˜not safe for workâ€™ content without using the â€œnsfwâ€ tag.
  • Scams or Fraudulent offers.
faq.can-link-post-header: Can I request adding backlink to my website from Ecency team?
faq.can-link-post-body: All the content on our site is created by our users and we don't modify or able to add backlinks. You are free to contact author of the post or Signup to open your own blog and community, publish articles to create backlinks for free.
faq.can-guest-post-header: Is it possible to guest post on your website?
faq.can-guest-post-body: Publishing on Ecency is simple and easy, Signup to open your own blog and community, start posting your content.
faq.source-label-header: Content source labels, what are those?
faq.source-label-body: Content source helps you understand how content was published. In some cases you may see a third-party client name, which indicates the Content came from a non-Ecency application. Authors sometimes use third-party client applications to manage their blogs, communities. Third-party clients are software tools used by authors and therefore are not affiliated with, nor do they reflect the views of, the content. Content can be directly created by humans or, in some circumstances, automated by an application.
faq.how-to-contribute-header: How to contribute to the Ecency?
faq.how-to-contribute-body: Our awesome contributors helping us to shape Ecency. You can be part of this great movement, by joining our Translation team: Website, Mobile or by contributing with Ideas, Developing, Designing, Social media outreach skills. We try our best to support our contributors!
faq.why-refund-points-body: Boosting content reviewed and evaluated by our curators in their first 24 hours. Refund might happen due to multiple reasons, after 24 hours if no curator reviewed/curated content, if content is template or low effort based, if author has history of plagiarism, abuse, phishing or spamming, if content is too old to curate as new content gets more priority during review process.
faq.can-change-username-body: Account names on Ecency and Hive blockchain can not be changed. If you would like a new account name, you can create new account.
faq.can-delete-account-header: Can I delete or deactivate my account?
faq.can-delete-account-body: Accounts on Ecency can not be deactivated or deleted. The account along with all of its activity is permanently stored in the Hive blockchain.
faq.different-reward-choices-header: What are the differences in Reward types?
faq.different-reward-choices-body:
In publishing settings section, you can see 3 different Reward types/choices.

  • 50%/50% - This rewards in half Hive Power, and half liquid HIVE / Hive Dollars. The ratio of liquid HIVE to Hive Dollars rewarded is based on network conditions at the time of payout. This is the default payout option.
  • Power Up 100% - This option rewards the post in 100% Hive Power.
  • Decline Payout - Use this option to receive no post rewards. Votes will affect the post's position on the trending ranking but no rewards are paid from Hive's reward pool. Replies made to the post are still eligible for rewards.
faq.boosting-vote-buying-header: Is boosting considered a vote buying?
faq.boosting-vote-buying-body: No! Because, there is no guarantee of receiving vote, there is no guarantee of exact amount of vote, boosting maximum amount is limited, each content reviewed by our curators, there is no profit in it. All curation rewards are sent back to delegators 100%. Only measurable success we seek is to see engagement and growth on entire ecosystem. Boosting is simply creating additional use case for Ecency Points to improve engagement on platform, so it is essentially same as any other curation guilds on Hive. Goal of those guilds ultimately to improve engagement on platform and grow activity, the way each measures that success is the different.
faq.how-exchange-work-body: Exchanging and trading tokens on Ecency is very simple. We utilize internal peer to peer, decentralized exchange built into Hive blockchain. Offer easy to use interface so you can exchange one token to another, completely decentralized manner. Create buy or sell order and wait for other people to fill your order. If you want to quickly swap tokens then you can fill someone else's open order for quick trade.
faq.how-voting-works-body: Om op inhoud in Ecency te stemmen is heel eenvoudig, je kunt er alles over leren in het volgende artikel Steminhoud
faq.what-reputation-body: Reputation is a key factor that reflects how you behave and how the community members evaluate your work. Your journey on Hive starts with a 25 reputation score. This number will change depending on the number of upvotes you receive. Whether it increases or decreases depends only on you. If you find your place on Hive through quality content and comments, you will get a high reputation and a good income. But if there is abuse or plagiarism in your content, the downvotes you receive will undoubtedly cause your reputation to drop.
faq.improve-reputation-score-header: Hoe verbeter ik mijn Reputaion score?
faq.improve-reputation-score-body: Hoe meer stemmen je krijgt van gebruikers met een hoge reputatiescore hoe hoger jouw reputatiescore zal zijn. De beste manier om je reputatiescore te verbeteren is door meer stemmen te verdienen door waarde toe te voegen aan de gemeenschap.
faq.why-score-going-down-body: Je verdiende upvotes en downvotes hebben een invloed op je reputatie score. De downvotes van een andere gebruiker met een hogere reputatie kan ervoor zorgen dat je reputatiescore omlaag gaat. Als je downvotes krijgt maar je upvotes zijn meer dan downvotes (gewogen door Hive Power), dan zal het netto effect op je reputatiescore positief blijven.
faq.what-hive-witnesses-body: Rol van beheerders of blok producenten in de Hive blockchain moeten fungeren als het bestuur van het netwerk. Top 20 beheerders produceren elke minuut blokken terwijl de anderen blijven als backup beheerder en elke minuut een willekeurige kans krijgen. De gemeenschap kiest hen om hun stem te vertegenwoordigen en elke gebruiker kan maximaal 30 beheerders kiezen. Deze rol is een integraal onderdeel van het consensusmechanisme blockchain en beveelt gebruiker engagement aan om te stemmen op vertrouwde beheerders. Beheerders worden gecompenseerd met Hive Power voor elk blok dat ze creÃ«ren.
faq.how-vote-witnesses-header: Hoe kan ik op beheerders stemmen?
faq.how-vote-witnesses-body: Bezoek Beheerder pagina en klik op het stempictogram.
faq.what-are-hive-body: HIVE zijn verhandelbare tokens die op elk moment kunnen worden overgedragen. HIVE kan worden omgezet in Hive Power in een proces dat HIVE wordt genoemd of staking hiv. Het is een cryptocurrency token, vergelijkbaar met Bitcoin.
faq.what-are-hive-power-body: HIVE Power is een invloed token. Door deze vast te houden neemt het in hoeveelheid toe en geeft het meer stem invloed. Des te meer HIVE Power iemand heeft, des te meer invloed deze heeft op de beloningen van anderen. En het geeft hogere verdiensten bij het waarderen van anderen hun publicaties. Hive Power is staked HIVE token die opgeheven kan worden na 13 weken.
faq.what-are-hd-header: Wat zijn HIVE DOLARS of HBD?
faq.what-are-hd-body: Hive Dollars (veel afgekort HBD) zijn tokens met een waarde van ongeveer $1.00 aan HIVE. Hive Dollars kunnen met HIVE worden verhandeld en worden overgebracht naar andere rekeningen voor handel of uitwisseling. Hive Dollars kunnen ook worden omgezet in HIVE door een proces dat 3,5 dagen duurt.
faq.what-delegated-hp-body: Hive Power can be delegated to users by another user. When user is delegated Hive Power - their Resource Credits, content votes, and curation rewards are calculated as if it were their own Hive Power. Users are not able to power down or cash out delegated Hive Power however, as it still belongs to the original owner.
faq.what-powering-up-body: You can power up your earned Hive tokens to Hive Power at any time. It means your HIVE are kept in your wallet and converts to HIVE Power, which increases your voting power and resource credits on the blockchain. Having more Hive Power also increases the amount of curation rewards and new vested tokens that you can earn. More HP also grants more influence on approving Hive witnesses.
faq.what-powering-down-body: Hive Power can be powered down in the same wallets where it can be powered up. When you power down, HIVE Power will not be available as HIVE immediately. It is converted in 13 equal parts and transferred into your HIVE wallet weekly, the first portion only being available a week after the power down was initiated.
faq.why-different-keys-body:
Er zijn verschillende sleutels met de juiste permissies voor wat je doet.

  • Posting sleutels - deze sleutel moet worden gebruikt voor sociale netwerkacties, zoals berichten, commentaar en stemmen. Deze sleutel heeft een beperkte permissie en kan niet worden gebruikt voor monetaire acties. Je kunt dus geen geld verliezen als iemand anders toegang krijgt tot deze sleutel.
  • Actieve sleutel - deze sleutel heeft extra machtigingen voor meer gevoelige monetaire-gerelateerde acties, zoals het overdragen en uitwisselen van tokens. Bij het uitvoeren van een gerelateerde portemonnee kan gevraagd worden om zich te verifiÃ«ren met uw Actieve sleutel. U dient alleen uw Actieve sleutel in te voeren in apps die u vertrouwt, omdat iedereen met toegang tot deze sleutel uw tokens kan nemen. Doe jezelf een plezier en sla deze sleutel veilig op om te voorkomen dat tokens in de toekomst verloren gaan.
  • Eigenaar sleutel - is de meest krachtige sleutel omdat deze elke sleutel van een account kan veranderen, inclusief de eigenaar sleutel. Idealiter is het bedoeld om offline opgeslagen te worden en alleen gebruikt om een in gevaar gebracht account te herstellen.
faq.stolen-hive-hbd-header: Wat kan ik doen als mijn HIVE of Hive dollartokens gestolen of naar het verkeerde account verzonden worden?
faq.stolen-hive-hbd-body: Er is niets aan te doen als je liquide tokens worden gestolen of naar de verkeerde acoount worden verzonden, maar als je tokens in Hive Power staan, is het onmogelijk om van meer dan 1/13 deel van je tegoed per week bestolen te worden, en als je tokens spaargeld hebben, moeten ze drie dagen wachten voordat ze kunnen worden overgedragen. Het vast zetten van je tegoeden dooormiddel van Staking/powering omhoog of geld overzetten naar spaargeld kan veiliger zijn.
faq.what-are-tags-body: Een sleutelwoord is een stukje informatie dat de inhoud beschrijft waaraan het is toegewezen. Ze helpen zoekmachines de inhoud van pagina's online te identificeren en die informatie te gebruiken, produceren de beste resultaten voor een bepaalde zoekopdracht. Alle sleutelwoorden moeten kleine letters zijn. Spaties zijn niet toegestaan, maar koppelteken woorden met een enkel streepje zijn toegestaan.
faq.how-use-tags-body: Gebruikers kunnen de sleutelwoorden van hun keuze maken, maar door een handig vsleutelwoord te kiezen kunnen gebruikers je post heel gemakkelijk vinden. Je eerste introductie post kan bijvoorbeeld populair zijn door alleen het introductie sleutelwoord te gebruiken. Zorg ervoor dat je sleutelwoorden gebruikt die gerelateerd zijn aan je bericht, anders kan je bericht downvotes krijgen voor verkeerd gebruik van sleutelwoorden.
faq.why-publish-gray-body: Na het schrijven van uw bericht kunt u zien dat de publicatieknop nog steeds grijs is, zorg ervoor dat u een goede titel en ten minste Ã©Ã©n geldig sleutelwoord heeft gekozen. Als je deze niet ingeeft, wordt de Publicatie knop uitgeschakeld.
faq.what-links-show-header: Wat laten de Trending, Hot, Nieuw, Populair en Controverseel links zien?
faq.what-links-show-body:
This is the way of sorting content on Ecency.

  • Trending - Widely mentioned or discussed posts.
  • Hot - Popular posts in last couple hours.
  • New - The newest posts sorted by the published time.
  • Rising - Posts that have more comments and votes compare to others.
  • Controversial - Has a relatively equal number of upvotes and downvotes.
faq.what-my-rewards-header: What kind of rewards I have in my wallet?
faq.what-my-rewards-body:
There are three kind of rewards are shown in your wallet:

  • Curation rewards - The rewards earned for upvoting posts and comments.
  • Author rewards - The rewards earned by your own posts and comments.
  • Points rewards - Social actions and interactions also rewarded with Ecency points.
faq.what-information-profile-header: What kind of information is shown on my profile?
faq.what-information-profile-body: The first information shown near your image is your reputation score and display name, description. Below information about followers and following, registration date on Ecency. You have the option to add extra information on Ecency settings such as about information, profile image, cover image, your location.
faq.what-can-post-header: What can I post on Ecency?
faq.what-can-post-body: Ecency is home of free speech where you can post everything you created: phrases, quotes, blogs, anecdotes, photos, videos, memes, songs, and more. Be creative! Just be careful of spam or abuse
faq.add-images-videos-header: How to add images and videos to my posts?
faq.add-images-videos-body: You have several options like browsing your hard drive to add an image by clicking on the selecting them link from within the editor or if you have copied image just click ctrl+v (cmd+v) and your image will be uploaded into your post or comment. Another way that you can use for videos and images is paste the image or video's web address (URL) into the editor and it will automatically be added.
faq.what-thumbnail-image-body: Thumbnail is reduced-size version of picture taken from your post that can be viewer's first impression about your post. You can choose a thumbnail before publishing your post. In post creation page, click Advanced button and select any one of your images as thumbnail.
faq.what-dollar-amount-header: What are the dollar amounts next to posts and comments?
faq.what-dollar-amount-body: The dollar amounts next to posts and comments are estimates of the potential payout that will occur when the payout period ends, based on the current voting activity and price of HIVE. It is the potential payout that may go up or down until the period ends. Payouts occur as a combination of Hive Power and Hive Dollars. Sometimes the blockchain may substitute HIVE in place of the Hive Dollars based on market conditions.
faq.hive-dollar-worth-header: Will 1 Hive Dollar always be worth $1.00 USD?
faq.hive-dollar-worth-body: The price of Hive Dollar changes around 1 USD depending on market conditions of the demand and supply. If price is below 1 USD, you are encouraged to convert HBD to HIVE to get 1 USD worth of HIVE tokens. When above 1 USD, you can trade them to buy more HIVE on market.
faq.convert-hive-dollar-header: How long does it take to convert Hive Dollars to HIVE?
faq.convert-hive-dollar-body: The blockchain will process the transaction over a period of 3.5 days for conversions Hive Dollars to HIVE.
faq.what-voting-power-body: Uw stemkracht daalt elke keer een beetje dat u stemt. Het begint met 100 procent stemkracht en u gebruikt bij het stemmen weinig stemkracht. Hoe meer u stemt, des te minder invloed u heeft, wat betekent dat de efficiÃ«ntie van uw stem zal afnemen. Dagelijks 10 stemmen worden aanbevolen om de efficiÃ«ntie en curatie beloningen beter te gebruiken.
faq.how-many-vote-header: How many times can I vote with my voting power?
faq.how-many-vote-body: Every 100% vote you cast will use 2% of your remaining voting mana. Your voting mana will recharge by 20% each day. You can vote more than 10 times per day, but each vote will be worth less, and it will take longer to reach full voting power again.
faq.what-is-hivesigner-body: When you were signing up on Hive you were given lots of keys that are hard to remember. The work of this Hivesigner is, it gives you the access to create your own password that you can remember and to provide a protection not to use your active key when logging into Hive platforms.
faq.what-is-keychain-body: Hive Keychain is a wallet browser extension for the Hive blockchain and cryptocurrency and allows users to securely log into and access multiple Hive-based platforms. It is available for Chrome, Brave and Firefox.
faq.videos-pictures-stored-header: Are pictures and video stored on the blockchain?
faq.videos-pictures-stored-body: Media content such as pictures, videos etc. are typically not stored directly on a blockchain. When you add pictures or video you are only adding a source reference to where they are located. Meaning you can add video content from other locations. As of right now, when you upload a photo, this gets hosted on a regular web server.
faq.value-hive-hbd-header: What determines the value of HIVE and HBD?
faq.value-hive-hbd-body: The value of HIVE comes from the demand and supply of the token. HIVE will always be in demand based on the way the system is designed and there will always be supply for HIVE. As long as the Hive blockchain exist with continuous development and users being active, there will always be demand and supply for HIVE, adding value to the token.
faq.exclude-reblogs-feed-header: How to exclude reblogs from Friends Feed?
faq.exclude-reblogs-feed-body: Your Feed includes posts about your friends' activity, including when your friends reblog posts they want. If you don't want to see posts about a friend's reblogged activity in your Feed, you can sort it by Excluding Reblog option that can be found on the top right.
faq.how-to-sort-feed-header: How to sort Trending, Hot, and New links?
faq.how-to-sort-feed-body: Global or My Community options can sort them. Usually, the Global option is automatically selected. In the Global option, you can find Hot, Trending, and New post links from all over Hive. By selecting the My Community option, you can only see posts from the Community link that you are a member of.
faq.how-to-follow-body: When you follow a profile, you may see updates from that person in your Feed. Click Searching Bar in the top left of Ecency and enter the name of the person chosen from the results. On the profile page, click Follow icon.
faq.how-find-information-followers-header: How to find information about Your Following and Followers?
faq.how-find-information-followers-body: You can see the number of people you're following and your Followers by clicking Followers and Following below your cover photo.
faq.how-to-search-header: How to search something on Ecency?
faq.how-to-search-body: Click search icon in the top left on Ecency. Type who or what you want to search for, then click on the list of results. When typing something, you may see predictions for what you're looking for. If you see what you're looking for in these predictions, click it to save time searching.
faq.how-to-search-advanced-header: How to use Advanced Search options on Ecency?
faq.how-to-search-advanced-body: After typing into search field, you are presented with limited results instantly. But you can expand your search and narrow down by clicking on More Results option which will open dedicated search page. In that page, you will find Advanced option which give much more filtering fields by author, topic, category or community, time range, keywords, type of content (comment or post), etc. These additional inputs can help you find information quickly and you can also use these to always stay up to date with topics you are interested in.
faq.what-appears-search-body: Your search results are based on the posts, communities, accounts and topics that you searched for. More results open up advanced options to apply and help you narrow down info you are searching for.
faq.what-are-referrals-body: Your referral is link that can be shared to invite friends to the platform. You can see a list of all the users you have referred to the Ecency, Copy your referral link and other informations by clicking Referrals under your cover photo.
faq.what-mean-promoted-header: What does the Promoted icon in the Feed mean?
faq.what-mean-promoted-body: When browsing the feed, we it can be seen a Promoted icon next to some posts. This icon indicates that the post author has used Ecency's Promote Post feature so that the post can be shared with more users. You can promote your post in the feed by clicking the three dots above the post and selecting the Promote function from there.
faq.how-market-works-body: Market is the place that is decentralized exchange to Buy and Sell tokens on Hive blockchain.In Ecency Market, you can also see complete information about Hive sales, purchase history, current price offers, and demands in chart form.u
faq.how-to-swap-body: You can perform various actions on your tokens by clicking on the Market function on the main page. First, you will be able to exchange Hive to HBD or HBD to Hive without waiting 3.5 days and any fee.
faq.criteria-boosting-post-header: Is there any criteria for boosting post?
faq.criteria-boosting-post-body: All curators have different criteria for using their votes to give out boosts when Ecency VP drops below 80%. For example, one can only boost posts published on Ecency. Another curator may give out boosts only to posts that have boosted under 300 Points. Another may only boost low rewarded posts. Another may only boost posts with over 200 word count. Or any combination of the above. There are no hard rules about what gets boosted. It's up to each curator. It is one more way that blockchain is decentralized. Curators are volunteers and independent, Ecency has some suggestions but ultimately curators freedom on their selections.
faq.what-gift-button-means-header: What does the gift button means on Ecency?
faq.what-gift-button-means-body: You can reward the posts you like by upvoting them. This isn't the only way of rewarding them, posts can br rewarded with Hive, HBD or Ecency points. All you have to do is click on the gift icon below the post. This feature is also a great way to reward posts that have already received their reward after 7 days.
faq.what-savings mean-header: What does the Savings mean in my wallet?
faq.what-savings mean-body: You can earn from existing Hive or HBD in your balance without converting it to Hive Power. By transferring Hive or HBD from your balance to Savings, you will earn 20% APR a year. You can withdraw it at any time, but Balance is subject to 3 days withdrawal waiting period.
faq.what-engine-tokens-body: Hive Engine is a smart contracts side-chain platform for the Hive blockchain. It is a decentralized marketplace for buying and selling tokens on Hive blockchain as well as other cryptocurrency networks. Users can do a couple of amazing things on hive engine which include creating and issuing custom tokens, setting up liquidity pools with rewards integrated, creating tokenized communities called outposts with integrated token rewards mechanisms, creating NFTs, setting up DAOs called Decentralized Token Fund(DTF), create airdrops, claim drops and even token mining mechanisms and lots more.
faq.what-staking-body: Staking is depositing a token in your wallet and receiving rewards for not selling it while it is staked. It is a process that involves committing your tokens to support a blockchain network. Staking is an easy way to earn interest on your cryptocurrency holdings. If a token you own allows staking you can â€œstakeâ€ some of your holdings and earn a percentage-rate reward over time.
faq.how-to-stake-body: Information about what tokens you have, how many you have, and what you can do with them can be found in your wallet. Not every token can be staked. If you are considering staking, ensure that the token you want  can be staked by clicking it in your wallet. There should be staking option. Click on it and enter the amount of tokens you want to stake in your wallet.
faq.what-is-reblogging-body: A reblog is when you see a post you find usefull, and by clicking the reblog button, you make the post appear on your blog too. Now all of your followers can enjoy the post. You can fing Reblog icon under the post or you can choose from the options that appear when you click on the three dots at the top of the post .
faq.how-to-bookmark-header: How to bookmark content on Ecency?
faq.how-to-bookmark-body: If you want to engage and read content later, simply bookmark it and come back later to read and engage. You can learn all about it in following article How to bookmark content
faq.how-to-favorite-header: How to favorite people on Ecency?
faq.how-to-favorite-body: When you add friends to your Favorites list on Ecency, you'll get notifications when they create a post. To add Favorites: Tap the friends like to add. Click on a star that will appear next to their photo. You can remove friends Favourites list at any time.
faq.what-notifications-get-header: What kind of notifications I get on Ecency?
faq.what-notifications-get-body:
Ecency may send notifications for several reasons, including when someone:

  • Follows you
  • Votes on your comment or post
  • Mentions you
  • Replies your comment or post
  • Reblogs one of your content
  • Transfers (HIVE, HBD and new Engine token transfers)
  • Delegations (Hive Power delegations)
  • Your Favorite author pulishes a post
  • Replies your Bookmarked content
faq.how-create-community-header: How to create a Community on Ecency?
faq.how-create-community-body: Creating Community includes several steps, you can learn all about it in following article Voting content
faq.turn-off-notifications-header: How to turn off notifications I don't want to be notified?
faq.turn-off-notifications-body: You can turn off notifications you don't want to get notified on Ecency. Firstly Click on the Notifications bell and find Settings icon. Turn off Notifications you don't want to get notified.
faq.getting-post-notifications-header: Why am I getting notifications that people are publishing posts?
faq.getting-post-notifications-body: If you add someone to your Favorite list, you will get notified when their post is published. Go to the main menu and check your Favorites list. If you don't want to get notifications you can just Unfavorite them by going to their page.
faq.find-friends-header: How to Find more friends on Ecency?
faq.find-friends-body: At the top right of the Ecency page, you can see Discover/Community button. By clicking Discover, you can find information about Most Active users, Curators and Popular users.
faq.accounts-included-leaderboard-header: Which accounts are included in the Leaderboard?
faq.accounts-included-leaderboard-body: Leaderboard acoounts are based on the total number of actions performed, such as commenting and creating a post. The most Actives are always the ones who earn the most Points by being active on Ecency. The list takes a certain time frame and is constantly updated. Leaderboard people are recommended to new signups, when new people join Ecency they will see leaderboard accounts as recommendation to follow.
faq.find-communities-body: By clicking Communities in the Discover/Communities button at the top right of the page, you will be presented with a list of Communities. The Communities are sorted in a certain order, and you can join the group you want by choosing one of the sorting options, such as Hot, Rank, Members, New, by clicking the Join button.
faq.what-communities-body: Many accounts with a similar outlook unite around one Community to support each other and share their experiences. You can join various communities at the same time potentially connect and make more friends, get hundreds of followers and support on your new content. Joining communities is pretty simple and very easy.
faq.how-post-community-header: How can I publish my post in Community?
faq.how-post-community-body: Choosing the right Community is just as important as choosing the right Title when you start writing your Post. After choosing a title, under title you have a button to choose whether to publish the post on your blog or in one of the Communities joined. The Community ID number you choose will be your first tag. Don't forget to introduce with the rules of the Community before publishing a post in any Community.
faq.leave-community-header: How to leave Community on Ecency?
faq.leave-community-body: From your Feed, click Communities in the left menu and select your group. Go to the Joined button where you can see Leave option, select Leave.After leaving Community will be removed from your list of Communities and you will no longer see them in your Feed.
faq.how-schedule-body:
You can schedule a post to publish at a specific time.

  • Click on the pen icon and write a post.Then Click on the Advanced right under your post.
  • Choose Schedule option.
  • Select the date and time that you want the post to publish.
  • Click Apply then Schedule button.
faq.how-delete-scheduled-header: How to edit or delete a scheduled post?
faq.how-delete-scheduled-body: From the main Menu choose Schedule. Thee you will se a list of scheduled posts. Under posts there are 2 options: Move to drafts(there you can reschedule, edit)or delete scheduled post.
faq.how-set-beneficiaries-body: You can set beneficiaries to share author reward with other accounts. Authors may share their rewards with others for a variety of reasons. It's up to you how much of your reward you want to share with. First create Post then Click Advanced. There you can Set Beneficiaries by clicking on it. Choose username and percent of the reward you want to share and click Done.
faq.possible-current-RC-header: What's possible with my current available RC?
faq.possible-current-RC-body: Below your username, there is a brief description of your RC. Click on the bottom of this information. You will have complete details on how many RC you have, your RC delegations, and how many activities you can perform with your existing RC.
faq.what-delegating-RC-body: If you have extra RC that you don't use you can delegate your RC. It recharges during the time so you don't loose anyting. You can't delegate all your RC (and end up with 0 RC). RC give extra recoursec to perform more operations to the account you delegate. They can make more post or comments....
faq.how-to-delegate-header: How to delegate RC on Ecency?
faq.how-to-delegate-body: Clicking on your RC information under your username you can see Delegate RC operation. Enter username and amount RC you want to delegate then click Next and Confirm it.
faq.who-are-curators-body: Curators discover and vote for posts created by authors. They play an important role in Hive. The consensus in the community is that good content should be upvoted and should be rewarding for authors. The spam, plagiarized content should be downvoted.
faq.what-curation-reward-body: Curators will have reward (Hive Power) from the post payout. As a result of the vote given by the curators, the post will have a certain amount of payout. The author and the curator(s) share the post payout in the ratio of 50:50. The post payout happens in 7 days. So at the end of the 7 days, the author's and curator's rewards are available for claim.
faq.what-ecency-wallet-body: Ecency wallet is is a cryptocurrency wallet that allows Ecency community to manage their Hive, HBD, Hive Power, Savings and other different tokens. So a Ecency wallet provides all the features that are necessary for safe and secure transfers.
faq.what-do-hive-tokens-header: What can I do with my Hive tokens?
faq.what-do-hive-tokens-body:
In the Ecency wallet, you can perform various operations on your Hives:

  • Transfer- If you want to Transfer your Hive to someone, you can select Transfer and fill in the account name and amount of Hives to Transfer it.
  • Transfer to Savings- By transferring your Hive to Savings, you will get annual Interest from them.
  • Power Up- When powered up, your HIVE becomes staked and converts to HIVE Power, which increases your voting power and resource credits on the blockchain. You can Power Up Hive and Save it in your Account or Transfer it to other accounts as Hive Power through filling account name field.
  • Trade Token- Clicking on it redirects you the Ecency Market Page where you can exchange tokens. Hive can be Swapped to HBD wihtout waiting period 3,5 days.
faq.what-delegated-HP-body: When you delegate Hive power you make a portion of your HIVE Power available to another user. Delegated Hive Power increases Voting Powe, Curation Rewards and Recourse Credits of that account. When a delegation is cancelled the HIVE Power will only be available again after 7 days.

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.description: These great people contributed in one way or another to Ecency, we would like to thank them all. If you want to join our team by contributing with Translation, Ideas, Development, Designing, Social awareness, feel free to join. To learn more read our FAQ.

chain-error.min-root-comment: You may only post once every five minutes.
chain-error.identical-vote: Your current vote on this content is identical to this vote.
chain-error.delete-comment-with-vote: Cannot delete a content with positive pending rewards.
chain-error.comment-cashout: Content after their payout cannot be deleted.
chain-error.comment-children: Cannot delete a content with replies.
chain-error.paid-out-post-forbidden: Voting for paid out content is not available.
chain-error.missing-authority: This operation requires Active private key or authority.
chain-error.missing-owner-authority: This operation requires Owner private key or authority.

landing-page.what-is-ecency: Decentralized, rewarding, true ownership social network
landing-page.various-digital-tokens: and earn various digital tokens, reward others and build a rewarding community.
landing-page.true-ownership-desc: Ecency is the next generation social network for Web 3.0. Blockchain technology gives you a real free speech, without any censorship or banning. Only you control your own account, content and communities.
landing-page.decentralization-desc: has many social, gaming and financial apps that you can access with a single account you own. Access your social network account and content from any other 3rd party apps in decentralized way.
landing-page.open-source-desc: Join and be part of the building team on Web 3.0. Everything that we build is blockchain-based and open source. We welcome tech talents, developers, creators and entrepreneurs.
landing-page.download-our-application-desc-2: The social network with real free speech experience on your mobile phone or desktop. Blockchain's powerful benefits now always under your fingertips.
landing-page.our-history-p-one: Ecency (previously Esteem) started out in 2016, founder Feruz Muradov started implementing a mobile application that would revolutionize the way you interact and create, build, engage online. With time grew to something much bigger.
landing-page.our-history-p-two: Since then we have been continuing to build for Web 3.0 and improve our blockchain-based social network, making sure apps are as accessible as possible, secure and in many languages the world speaks.
landing-page.our-vision-p-one: We want to bring a secure and rewarding blockchain experience to all people. Social media without any limits and censorship, where only you control your own account and your communities. Secured by blockchain, powered by people.
landing-page.our-vision-p-two: Our main principles: Bring rewarding communities, true ownership, empowered creators, free speech into the hands of millions.
landing-page.subscribe-paragraph: Be first to know what's happening in decentralized web.
landing-page.success-message-subscribe: A verification link has been sent to your email account!
landing-page.error-occured: A server error has been occured.

feedback-modal.title: Error details
feedback-modal.question: How to fix this?
feedback-modal.insufficient-resource-title: How to get more Resource credits?
feedback-modal.insufficient-resource-buy-hive: Buy HIVE and Power it up
feedback-modal.insufficient-resource-wait: Wait few hours for RC refill
